Reviews.Content: This place is horrible, it is like hell, rooms are dirty, very old building , you feel like it is going to crash down any time ! I can just say I'd better stayed in street rather than this hotel. Don't make a mistake and spend your money somewhere else please

Reviews.Title: “Three Star Facilities, Five Star Value”
Reviews.Author: butlen
Reviews.Content: I liked it here. I'd say its a 3 Star hotel. Basic, clean, big rooms, en-suite, great local breakfast. I'd recommend this hotel for a good value break. Its really well located. You must get the metro when you transfer from the international airport. 2 lira token (about 70 cents) and just get on. The last metro stop (about 20 minutes on the metro) and you are 5 minutes walk to the hotel. The hotel is about a kilometre from sultanhamet (15 minute to 20 minute walk) which is the location of the main tourist and historical attractions and half a kilometre from the Grand Bazaar (uber huge shopping market). The breakfast was varied and fresh local salads, soft fresh bread, awesome view of the sea. Hotel service is ok. No problems from me. We spent on average â‚¬50 per night for both of us including breakfast over 6 nights. This is not the Four Seasons Hotel. Spend â‚¬250 a night if you want that. Our room was big, had a sofa, small table, TV (BBC, Russian and French TV). Water was always hot for us, room was warm in December. I'd guess that aircon here might not be perfect in all rooms in July/August, but its just a guess. The pool is small, but was warm enough. You can get a turkish bath in the hotel for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel condition and Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: jamalezzat
Reviews.Content: the location of the hotel is good and close to tramway and other buss stations as well as reastaurants BUT I was desapointed by having such a bad aircondition and miscommunications with the hotel reception, in addition to that not changing bed covers for 7 days and they only did after several complaining, having only one power plug to charge my cell phone, camera and PC, with only two lights one in the bath and the other one in the room, in fact it was a tabe lump. Honestly, I would never ever go back to this hotel as I suffered a lot. Jamal

Reviews.Title: “The Worst Hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: Abu-Alan
Reviews.Content: Aspen is the worse Hotel i ever saw; it is listed under 4 stars category while it shouild be -4 . The Air-cond is not working and the front desk says that it will work after 9:00 pm ??? One of the staff in front desk is very rude and un-coopreative while the night shift guys were very freindly and helpful. rooms are small and not much clean..bathrooms are worse... one day we faced a water shortage... the problem we had came to this hotel with a tourist group and it was too late to change the hotel... No Wifi in rooms (only in the loby)....

Reviews.Title: “One very rude hotel staff!!”
Reviews.Author: ChristineandBrendon
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 1 night only. Having arrived in Istanbul very late at night we saw the hotel and got a reasonable price for the room. We were told it was a 4 star hotel but I saw on the net that it is a 3 star. The room was fine, quite spacious, although quite hot. The AC didn't seem to work very well. My main issue arose on the day of our departure. On this morning I thought I had lost my second passport so we were 15 minutes past check out time. I went down to reception to ask if I had left my passport there but was greeted by an extremely rude man who paid no attention to the fact that I had perhaps lost an important document but kept insisting that I was late for checkout and that he would charge me another day if I was not out of the hotel in 10 minutes. My other passport was still at reception from check in time so this man flung this passport at me, insisting that this was my passport so there was nothing to worry about even though I persistently tried to tell him that I had two passports. I was quite distraught by this time, worried I had lost my other passport and upset that I was being treated in such a rude manner. I would not stay here again as I have never been treated so rudely and with such disrespect ever before. And I have stayed in many hotels..

Reviews.Content: Nothing please you no AC damaged refrigerator zero service Food is not good Its terrible

Reviews.Title: “This hotel had no air conditioning in July and I would give this hotel 2 stars.”
Reviews.Author: turkeyChicago_IL
Reviews.Content: I was with a tour to Istanbul and was given a choice of about 15 hotels (4 and 5 star) to choose from. First, this hotel was not my choice. The travel agency moved me to this hotel (Aspen Hotel) and listed it as a 4 star hotel. We didn't mind, since it was in busy, shopping district. But, when we got to Istanbul, we were told we had to go to another hotel because there was no air conditiong in Aspen Hotel. We stayed at this other hotel for two nights and then we were forced to go back to Aspen Hotel. Thank God, it was our last night, since we still had no A/C and it was leaking and the bathtub was leaking. Other people in our tour who stayed at the hotel checked out before they completed a night there because there was no A/C and the rooms were small. What's up with double beds when you ask for a king-sized bed.?!
